meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joe Kenyon Lee Vinson Nancy Feinstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #989.

td.p: Joe Kenyon, a student from Stone Mountain, Georgia
Lee Vinson, a legal secretary originally from Detroit, Michigan
Nancy Feinstein, an emergency room nurse and travel agent from Petaluma, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,600)

tr.td: ARTISTS
TECHNOLOGY
SPORTS
LANGUAGES
FAT MUSIC
SKIN

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [to Nancy] Who is [*]? Absolutely right. You don\'t need the "s" at the end of his name. [*].)
NancyWho is Francis Scott Keys?
$1,700
JoeWho is JFK
$4,400
LeeWho is Washington?
$2,600
Francis Scott Key')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The U.S. flag flies 24 hours a day over both his birthplace & his grave')

tr.td: AMERICANA
The U.S. flag flies 24 hours a day over both his birthplace & his grave
Nancy
Lee
Joe
2-day champion: $9,400
2nd place: trip on Eastern to Tampa, Florida & stay at Safety Harbor Spa & Fitness + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
3rd place: Maytag washer & dryer + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
Nancy
Lee
Joe

20 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

15 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W
